title: Public Reckoning: Council on Trial
outcome: Amid daily confusion, masked protesters release fragments of a 2022 Council selection simulation, revealing true scores and predicted outcomes for several Council members. Public hunger for justice explodes into citywide show trials and mass accusations. Rival Council factions try to suppress information as some administrators defect, feeding the media with more historical secrets.

events.description: Masked protesters broadcast Council member scores and simulated selection footage from 2022, sparking outrage and calls for accountability.
Large crowds gather at government buildings, demanding show trials of implicated Council members, while neighborhood courts form ad hoc to judge local authorities.
Some Council administrators, fearing exposure, defect and leak classified Council deliberations to citizen-run feeds, intensifying the legitimacy crisis.
Mass protests escalate into public interrogations, with accused officials forced to confess or face ongoing social ostracism. Council security struggles to maintain control.
